body: Discrete mathematics and foundations for modern computer science. Topics include sets, relations, logic, algorithms, graphs, finite state machines and regular expressions.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Concurrent: CMPSC122)(Additional Attributes: NONE)
contentHtml: Discrete mathematics and foundations for modern computer science. Topics include sets, relations, logic, algorithms, graphs, finite state machines and regular expressions.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Concurrent: CMPSC122)(Additional Attributes: NONE)
title: CMPSC 360: Discrete Mathematics for Computer Science
